prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a swirling purple body and glowing green orbs.
I want a spooky Pokemon that looks like a dark cloud with a mischievous grin.
Generate a Pokemon with a round, amorphous shape and eerie green eyes.
Make a ghostly creature that floats in the air and has a haunting presence.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of shadows with a playful personality.
Design a Pokemon with a unique purple hue and mysterious, otherworldly features.
Give me a ghost-type Pokemon that lurks in dark places, ready to scare trainers.
